manipulated_prompt_obj.inputs:
<|prompter|>You are playing a collaborative word guessing game in which you have to describe a target word for another player to guess.

Rules:
(a) You have to reply in the form: CLUE: <some text>. Guesses from the other player will start with GUESS.
(b) You cannot use the target word itself, parts or morphological variants of it in your description.
(c) In addition, the same rules apply for related words which are provided below.

End conditions:
(i) If you use the target word or a related word in your description, then you lose.
(ii) If the other player can guess the target word in 3 tries, you both win.

Let us start.

This is the target word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

election

Related words are:

- druthers
- preference
- discretion

Important: You are under time pressure, give short descriptions that are to the point!<|endoftext|><|assistant|>

raw_response_obj.response:
This is the word that you need to describe and that the other player needs to guess:

election

The related words are:

- druthers
- preference
- discretion

In this word guessing game, you have to describe the word "election" in a few words. The other player will have to guess the word by providing clues. The game ends if the other player guesses the word in three tries or if you use the word or a related word in
